channel.title: Bitvise SSH Client & Server on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Bitvise SSH Client & Server on Machine Learning

item.title: Bitvise SSH Client & Server
item.description: CLIENT # tunnelling (c2s) # (redirect traffic from Client ports to Server ports) The client will listen on interface 127.0.0.1 and forward the request to the server, the server will forward the request to the destination. See also: bit.ly/s_ssh > # SSH Tunneling > ## port forwarding (direct forwarding). proxy # “SOCKS/HTTP Proxy Forwarding” is in tab “Services”. SERVER # (only necessary for windows) installation # Download Bitvise SSH Client and/or Server from official web.
